boons.name: Thread Rewound
boons.description: Reroll the last d20 roll affecting you. You must accept the new result.

boons.name: Hand of Fate
boons.description: Declare before rolling. Your next d20 roll becomes a natural 20. The consequences of this outcome are fully realized and cannot be mitigated or softened.

boons.name: Phoenix Spark
boons.description: Instantly revive an incapacitated character (including yourself) with 30% of their maximum HP. Removes the incapacitated state. The revival leaves visible scars, lingering exhaustion, or an omen that Syrus may later call upon.

boons.name: Moment Unbroken
boons.description: Negate a single instance of incoming damage or remove one condition affecting you.

boons.name: Second Breath
boons.description: Instantly recover 5 HP or remove the Exhausted condition. Cannot exceed maximum HP.

boons.name: Veil Pierced
boons.description: Gain advantage on a single Awareness, Lore, or Arcana roll.

boons.name: Strike True
boons.description: After a successful hit, increase damage or force the target to make a Resist Roll or suffer a minor condition determined by Syrus.

boons.name: Fate's Sidestep
boons.description: Convert a failed Reflex or Stealth roll into a partial success, introducing a meaningful complication.

boons.name: Ember of Resolve
boons.description: Gain advantage on your next Will or Focus Resist Roll.
